benefits.securityTrainingExpert: Trainings conducted by Information Security experts.
benefits.directApplicationLabs: Practical labs for direct application of acquired knowledge.
benefits.freeCTFs: Free Capture the Flags (CTFs) to test skills and competencies.
benefits.regularUpdates: Access to regular updates on trends, techniques, and tools in.

testimonialsData.name: Nadiusk Santana
testimonialsData.content: I hope for a combination of comprehensive, up-to-date, and accessible content for all levels of knowledge.

testimonialsData.name: João Barroso
testimonialsData.content: Hakyoff should maintain close contact with its students, encouraging them to acquire the knowledge offered.

testimonialsData.name: Idalécio Silva
testimonialsData.content: I hope it becomes a revolutionary platform for training professionals and enthusiasts in cybersecurity.

testimonialsData.name: Jagat Singh
testimonialsData.content: I hope Hakyoff offers innovative and practical training, empowering professionals in cybersecurity.

testimonialsData.name: Joaquim Timóteo
testimonialsData.content: I hope Hakyoff provides a practical and dynamic environment to enhance cybersecurity skills.

testimonialsData.name: Charlene Medida
testimonialsData.content: I hope Hakyoff simulates real and immersive scenarios, promoting practical and effective learning.

title: HakyOff
HakyOff
hero.description: HakyOff is a platform dedicated to Information Security training, with a primary focus on Offensive Security. We offer a variety of specialized training, engaging practical labs, and an active community of cybersecurity professionals and enthusiasts.

aboutUs.title: Who We Are?
aboutUs.description: is a Startup dedicated to Information Security training, with a primary focus on Offensive Security. We offer a variety of specialized training, engaging practical labs, and an active community of cybersecurity professionals and enthusiasts. We strive to provide an immersive and challenging learning experience that prepares participants to face the complex challenges of the information security world.
aboutUs.button: Check out the benefits we have for you!

objectives.title: Our Objectives
items: Cultivate an engaged and collaborative community.

vision.title: Our Vision
items: is to be recognized as a world-leading platform in cybersecurity training, driving excellence and innovation...
